name: Two Brothers (itch) (GamerGage Studio)
description:
HI, THIS GAME IS MADE UNDER GAMERGAGE STUDIO WE HAVE ALL RIGHTS AND COPY OF GAME/ART/IDEA/STORY WILL NOT BE TOLERATED THANKS.

THIS IS A STORY OF TWO BROTHERS RAJU AND KAJU BOTH LOVE EACH OTHERS. 

ONE DAY BOTH BROTHERS WERE IN A MARKET WHILE GOING TO HOME. KAJU FORGET HIS PURSE IN THE SHOP SO HE SAY RAJU I AM COMING YOU WAIT RAJU WAIT A LOT BUT HE DIDNT CAME AFTER THAT HE WENT TO SEARCH  KAJU . THIS HOW RAJU THE SMALLER BROTHER WENT ON A MISSION TO FIND KAJU.

SOME ARTS AND SOUNDS IS TAKEN BY OPENGAMEART RIGHTS RESERVED AND BY MY OWN GAME CHANGER.

Dveloped By Kushal Baid

Game Programmer 

Artist 

Founder

We will love if you play it we are gonna add more features soon and publish for android/mac/linux soon.. this is just a demo made under 48hrs During United Game Jam. Completed this Game In 2hrs. Because i am not able to get more to work.

How to Download If any donation thing come and if you dont want to donate just click on the No,Thanks Take me to Download Panel.  

And if you want to Donate than Pls do it helps us a Lot!

Dont forget to rate Guys
